text: int main ( ) { int tri [ 100 ] , t , n , j ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < ( n * ( n + 1 ) ) / 2 ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & tri [ j ] ) ; int len = j ; int base = n ; int step = base - 1 ; int stepc = 0 ; int i ; for ( i = len - base - 1 ; i >= 0 ; -- i ) { tri [ i ] += max ( tri [ i + step ] , tri [ i + step + 1 ] ) ; if ( ++ stepc == step ) { step -- ; stepc = 0 ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , tri [ 0 ] ) ; } return 0 ; }
